--- update_with_trailing_semicolon.sql
update foo set foo = bar, bar = foo where foo = 1;
--- AST
&ast.Update{
  Update:    0,
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 7,
    NameEnd: 10,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  As:      (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
  Updates: []*ast.UpdateItem{
    &ast.UpdateItem{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 15,
          NameEnd: 18,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
      },
      Expr: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
    },
    &ast.UpdateItem{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 26,
          NameEnd: 29,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
      },
      Expr: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 36,
    Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 42,
        NameEnd: 45,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 48,
        ValueEnd: 49,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "1",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
UPDATE foo SET foo = bar, bar = foo WHERE foo = 1
